response: narrative=Hannah Khan vanished after a sudden religious conversion, leaving behind her colleague puzzled. narrative=Hannah Khan, a 72-year-old retired engineer, was reported missing from her home on North Road, Insch. Hannah was scheduled to meet a family member at the parking lot on Seafield Circle, Buckie, AB56 5AD to discuss ongoing arrangements. Upon arrival, she appeared agitated due to a heated discussion about custody. Following the meeting, Hannah was last seen walking away, still upset, along Bog Road, AB31 4JU. Her disappearance raised concern due to the family dynamics involved. After several days of being unaccounted for, she was eventually found on Craigour Road, Torphins, by a member of the public who recognized her from missing person reports, returning her safely home.
